entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or snow or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
